annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added June 12, 2001, D.C. Law 13-309, § 2(c), 48 DCR 1613

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 13(b)(2) of Anti-Graffiti Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-389, May 5, 2010, 57 DCR 4332).
